column2: The Charm Person spell temporarily increases the target's opinion of you, but afterwards they'll realise what you've done and their opinion will go down.

§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nThe Charm Person spell temporarily increases the target's opinion of you, but afterwards they'll realise what you've done and their opinion will go down.
Tried to cast spell on me
The Comprehend Languages spell temporarily increases your diplomatic ability.
Open your spellbook to see available spells.
Close your spellbook and access other decisions.
Affected by a negative magical effect
Cast the Dispel spell, cleansing yourself of all temporary magical effects, including beneficial ones.
Cast the Disrupt Undead spell, which lowers the combat abilities of an undead enemy leader and has a chance to wipe out undead troops.
[From.GetBestName] has cast the Disrupt Undead spell!
Must be Journeyman Wizard of higher.
Must be Master Wizard of higher.
The Banish spell allows you to attempt to remove an Outsider character from this plane of existence permantently.

§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nThe Banish spell allows you to attempt to remove an Outsider character who you a rival, at war with or have reason to imprison from this plane of existence permantently.
Wild surge! Your spell has slipped from your control and churns chaotically! Anything could happen now!
Your skin is glowing purple, which is quite ridiculous.
Cast the Longevity spell, greatly increasing your lifespan. This has a small chance of failure, where nothing will happen.
[From.GetBestName] has tried to cast the Banish spell on you!
The spell Alustriel's Mantle creates a magical protection over the troops lead by this character.
Cast the Alustriel's Mantle spell, giving soldiers under your leadership magical protection against enemy attacks for a short while.
Cast the Nezram's Amethyst Aura spell, boosting your health.
Cast the Remove Disease spell to cure a disease from the target character.
Cast the Remove Disease spell to attempt to cure a disease from the target province.

§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision §G for either characters or provinces!§!\n\nCast the Remove Disease spell to cure a disease from the target character, or attempt to cure a plague on a province.
[From.GetBestName] has taken pity on me and used [From.GetHerHis] magic to cure me from one of my diseases!
By using your magic, you have rid yourself of one of the diseases afflicting you.
One of the diseases will be cured.
[From.GetBestName] has taken pity on me and used [From.GetHerHis] magic to cure [FromFrom.GetName] from the disease ravaging it!
By using your magic, you have rid [From.GetName] of the disease afflicting it.
Your attempts to heal [From.GetName] have failed.
Cast the Spell Mantle spell, increasing your resistance to hostile magical effects.
Cast the Planar Binding spell, summoning an outsider to serve you. You have no control over what kind of outsider is bound.
Cast the Burn Path spell, preventing the target from using arcane spells for the duration.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Burn Path spell, preventing the target from using arcane spells for the duration.
This character is temporarily unable to cast arcane magic
Rather suddenly you find yourself unable to use arcane magic! At the same time, you see [From.GetBestName] lurking nearby.
Cast the Slow spell, causing the targetted enemy commander's army to move slower.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Slow spell, causing the targetted enemy commander's army to move slower.
This character has been subjected to the Slow spell, which extends to [Root.GetHerHis] army!
Suddenly you feel sluggish. There is no doubt in your mind, [From.GetBestName] has cast a spell on you!
Cast the Longstrider spell on yourself, causing any armies you are leading to move faster for two months.
The longstrider spell causes both this character and any soldiers [Root.GetSheHe] commands.
Cast the fabricate spell, reducing build costs in the settlement's province for a small while.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rsettlement decision§!\n\nCast the fabricate spell, reducing build costs in the settlement's province for a small while.
Cast the Create Homunculus spell, creating a little construct to aid you, at the additional cost of a wound.
Homunculi are small constructs created by wizards out of various materials, and their own blood, to act as assistants.
Cast the Tenser's Transformation spell, briefly increasing your skill at personal combat.
Cast the Disintegrate spell, making an attempt to kill the target.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Disintegrate spell, making an attempt to kill the target.
You are ambushed by [From.GetBestName], who grimly points at you and shoots a beam of light from [Get.HerHis] hand. When it hits you, you are wracked by agony!
